rules.natural: If the artist utilizes alcohol, then the artwork is successful.
Under the condition that the animal depicts a natural habitat, the animal is approved for the artwork.

If insurance holds for the artwork, then whenever it is not the case that either the artwork violates regulations or, if the artwork features the animal, then the animal depicts a natural habitat, legal action does not occur.
If the artist utilizes technology, then the artwork is successful.
Whenever the gallery exhibits the artwork, the gallery receives funding.
Either the gallery exhibits the artwork or the patron sponsors the artwork.
Provided that the patron sponsors the artwork, then if the artist creates the artwork, either the artist utilizes alcohol or the artist utilizes technology.
If the audience attracts the artwork, then whenever the artist creates the artwork, either the artist utilizes alcohol or the artist utilizes technology.
Under the condition that the artwork generates revenue, the audience attracts the artwork.
If the gallery receives funding, then the artwork generates revenue.
Whenever it is not the case that either the artist utilizes alcohol or the artist utilizes technology, a backup plan exists.
If it is not the case that either the artwork violates regulations or, if the artwork features the animal, then the animal depicts a natural habitat, legal action occurs.

Provided that it is not the case that if it is not the case that either the artist utilizes alcohol or the artist utilizes technology, then a backup plan does not exist, the artwork features the animal.

If it is not the case that if it is not the case that either the artist utilizes alcohol or the artist utilizes technology, then a backup plan does not exist, the animal is not approved for the artwork.
Under the condition that insurance does not hold for the artwork, the artist faces bankruptcy.
